TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LineJoin extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how to join consecutive line or curve segments in a figure (subpath) contained in a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin Bevel = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies a beveled join. This produces a diagonal corner.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin Miter = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies a mitered join. This produces a sharp corner or a clipped corner, depending on whether the length of the miter exceeds the miter limit.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin MiterClipped = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies a mitered join. This produces a sharp corner or a beveled corner, depending on whether the length of the miter exceeds the miter limit.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin Round = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies a circular join. This produces a smooth, circular arc between the lines.
